trans-unit.source: Log on to the Azure Management Portal, and then click +NEW at the bottom of the screen.
trans-unit.target: Log on to the Azure Management Portal, and then click +NEW at the bottom of the screen.

trans-unit.source: Click on App Services, then Service Bus, then Notification Hub, then Quick Create.
trans-unit.target: Click on App Services, then Service Bus, then Notification Hub, then Quick Create.

trans-unit.source: Type a name for your notification hub, select your desired region, and then click Create a new Notification Hub.
trans-unit.target: Type a name for your notification hub, select your desired region, and then click Create a new Notification Hub.

trans-unit.source: Under Service Bus, click the namespace you just created (usually *notification hub name*-ns).
trans-unit.target: Under Service Bus, click the namespace you just created (usually *notification hub name*-ns).

trans-unit.source: On your namespace, click the Notification Hubs tab for your at the top, and then click on the notification hub you just created.
trans-unit.target: On your namespace, click the Notification Hubs tab for your at the top, and then click on the notification hub you just created.

trans-unit.source: Click the Configure tab at the top, enter the API Key value you obtained in the previous section, and then click Save.
trans-unit.target: Click the Configure tab at the top, enter the API Key value you obtained in the previous section, and then click Save.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Set the GCM API key in the Configure tab</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Set the GCM API key in the Configure tab</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Select the Dashboard tab at the top, then click View Connection String.
trans-unit.target: Select the Dashboard tab at the top, then click View Connection String.

trans-unit.source: Take note of the two connection strings.
trans-unit.target: Take note of the two connection strings.

trans-unit.source: Your notification hub is now configured to work with GCM, and you have the connection strings to both register your app to receive notifications and to send push notifications.
trans-unit.target: Your notification hub is now configured to work with GCM, and you have the connection strings to both register your app to receive notifications and to send push notifications.
